title: Hot type topics
content:
When producing writings on typography are there any hot topics? I am about to write a 6000word essay and need some inspiration or direction...can anyone help.

Some idea I had were.

How technology effected typography...  
How letters reflect the human body...

but these seem a little cliche...what exciting new topics are there for me to discover and enjoy...or where can i look to find out whats hot and not to give me any ideas?
author: hb28

comments.content: Screen Fonts--including the new Cleartype fonts for Windows, fonts for phones, whether MS made a wrong turn on this long ago, etc. etc.

[http://hayleyb28.deviantart.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723130732/http:/hayleyb28.deviantart.com/ "http://hayleyb28.deviantart.com/")
